reviewText:
This was a great package deal.  There are 10 episodes on the collections discs.  These play well and are fun to watch over and over.  The only negative was only one episode one the movie myth disc.  But, it was like a bonus disc with this deal.  One of our family's favorite episodes was the Mega Movie myths.  There were some great "extras" within the episode with movie spoofs.  Well worth the money and great to see again, and again.

We also love Collection 8!
